name: Terraform - Dev

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: ["dev"]
  push:
    branches: ["dev"]

permissions:
  id-token: write
  contents: read

env:
  AWS_REGION: ${{ vars.AWS_REGION }}
  TF_ENV: dev

jobs:
  plan:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select $TF_ENV || terraform workspace new $TF_ENV

      - name: Terraform Format Check
        run: terraform fmt -check -recursive

      - name: Terraform Validate
        run: terraform validate

      - name: Terraform Plan
        run: terraform plan -var-file="envs/dev.tfvars"

  apply:
    needs: plan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    # Auto-apply only on push events (not PRs)
    if: github.event_name == 'push'

    environment: dev

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select dev || terraform workspace new dev

      - name: Terraform Apply (dev auto)
        run: terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file="envs/dev.tfvars"
